Interface IJuego

All Known Implementing Classes:
Juego
public interface IJuego
Interface that defines the contract for the main "Cincuentazo" game engine. It specifies all the high-level operations the controller needs. Note: It uses other interfaces (IJugador) in its contract.

  • Method Details

    • iniciarJuego

      void iniciarJuego(int numMaquinas)
      Sets up and starts the game.
      Parameters:
      numMaquinas - The number of AI players (1, 2, or 3).

    • jugarCarta

      void jugarCarta(Carta carta)
      Attempts to play a non-Ace card for the current player.
      Parameters:
      carta - The card the player wants to play.
      Throws:
      JugadaInvalidaException - if the move is not allowed.

    • jugarCartaAs

      void jugarCartaAs(Carta carta, int valorElegido)
      Attempts to play an Ace card for the current player with a chosen value.
      Parameters:
      carta - The Ace card to play.
      valorElegido - The value chosen by the player (must be 1 or 10).
      Throws:
      JugadaInvalidaException - if the move is not allowed.

    • revisarEstadoJugadorActual

      boolean revisarEstadoJugadorActual()
      Checks if the current player has any valid move. If not, the player is eliminated.
      Returns:
      true if the player can play, false if they were eliminated.

    • siguienteTurno

      void siguienteTurno()
      Advances the turn to the next player in the list.

    • isJuegoTerminado

      boolean isJuegoTerminado()
      Checks if the game has ended (only one player remains).
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • getSumaMesa

      int getSumaMesa()
      Returns:
      The current sum on the table.

    • getUltimaCartaJugada

      Carta getUltimaCartaJugada()
      Returns:
      The last card played on the table.

    • getJugadorActual

      IJugador getJugadorActual()
      Returns:
      The player whose turn it is currently.

    • getJugadores

      List<IJugador> getJugadores()
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of all players still in the game.

    • getGanador

      IJugador getGanador()
      Returns:
      The winning player, or null if the game is not over.
